post.text:
#人贩贴

新加坡南洋理工大学校长Subra Suresh教授（前CMU卡内基梅隆大学前校长）与麻省理工学院李巨教授联合招博士后，请在五天内把简历发给李巨老师。博士后具体信息见如下
Prof. Subra Suresh is looking for a computational modeler to work at Nanyang Technological Univ, who will also collaborate closely with Prof. Ju Li at MIT.   If you have an excellent PhD student looking for postdoc position, please send in CV to liju@mit.edu within 5days.  Thanks!
https://ntu.wd3.myworkdayjobs.com/Careers/job/NTU-Main-Campus-Singapore/Research-Fellow--Machine-Learning-_R00002944-1
